parameters.name: styleName
parameters.shortdesc: The paragraph style to include as TOC entries in the TOC. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new TOCStyleEntry (Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the TOCStyleEntry.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the TOCStyleEntry with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the TOCStyleEntry with the specified name.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the TOCStyleEntries within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The TOCStyleEntry, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: TOCStyleEntry, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The TOCStyleEntry, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: TOCStyleEntry, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first TOCStyleEntry in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last TOCStyleEntry in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle TOCStyleEntry in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the TOCStyleEntry with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the TOCStyleEntry that follows the desired TOCStyleEntry.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the TOCStyleEntry whose index follows the specified TOCStyleEntry in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The TOCStyleEntry whose index comes before the desired TOCStyleEntry.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any TOCStyleEntry in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every TOCStyleEntry in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TOCStyleEntry.
Returns the TOCStyleEntry with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
